author: ashtipliyski
body:
This PR includes changes to the DQM modules responsible for the objects generated by Calo Layer 2 subsystem of Level-1 Trigger. Changes represent addition of plots for new energy sum quantities and cosmetic changes to the appearance of the plots. 

DQM paths affected are:
- L1T2016/L1TStage2CaloLayer2 (online DQM)
- L1T2016EMU/L1TStage2CaloLayer2EMU (emulator DQM)
- L1T2016EMU/L1TStage2CaloLayer2DERatio (data-emulator comparisons)

**Note that this PR needs more work and in its current form it will be used to evaluate the code changes necessary to introduce the aforementioned additions to DQM.**
title: Changes to online and emulator DQM for L1T/CALOL2 (jets, eg, tau and energy sums)
